posts.cooked:
I am having hard time understanding this part. image 909×626 32.5 KB Rule B states gaps can not be wider than 8in but the gap that "OK"arrow shows on the top-rhs is 9in. Am I understanding wrong what it means by width?

posts.name: Celine Li
posts.cooked: Does this mean that teams can’t have through the bumpers pickup with this new change?

posts.name: RoboGeek
posts.cooked:
It would seem so. Do NOT quote me, i’m reading along as well.

The outside diameter of the game piece is 14 inches

posts.name: Skye Leake
posts.cooked:
If the gap is >= 8 inches AND it is less than 1/4" deep then it is ok.

otherwise if a gap in the frame perimeter must be <= 8 inches if it is deeper than 1/4"

This rule is in here to deal with fasteners, bearing flanges, etc.
